body_html:
Makes sense. I was moving my code out of core/user_ops and into contrib/, and found this piece for synchronous mapping that I thought could be useful, but I agree it can make things messy in general.

Should I (or someone else) close this issue at this point?

body:
Makes sense. I was moving my code out of `core/user_ops` and into `contrib/`, and found this piece for synchronous mapping that I thought could be useful, but I agree it can make things messy in general.

Should I (or someone else) close this issue at this point?
